sentences.en: Advertisers and users have been for years for the hot upstart to settle on for ads.
sentences.cn: 广告客户和用户多年来一直等待这家广受欢迎的新贵企业就广告模式作出决定.
他是个不折不扣的暴发户.

sentences.en: He is, so to speak, an upstart.
sentences.cn: 可以说, 他是个暴发户.

sentences.en: He tried to pass for a gentleman; but everyone knew he was an upstart.
sentences.cn: 他设法将自己冒充成为一名绅士, 但每个人都知道他只是一位暴发户.

sentences.en: He tried to pass for a gentleman;but everyone knew he was an upstart.
sentences.cn: 他设法将自己冒充成为一名绅士，但每个人都知道他只是一位暴发户。

sentences.en: He was a new upstart and a gentleman of the first head.
sentences.cn: 他是个暴发户,是个新封的贵族.

sentences.en: I am going down to make it hot for that upstart!
sentences.cn: 我走下来刁难那个暴发户.

sentences.en: Much of this draws on the upstart science of happiness, which mixes psychology with economics.
sentences.cn: 这些大都与现今正势如破竹般发展的“快乐学”有关, 它将心理学融入经济学.

sentences.en: Surely the giant Sorcerer is not afraid of four more upstart pipsqueaks. Where is Eddie?
sentences.cn: 当然了,魔法师巨人是肯定不会害怕再多四个小矮人的. 埃迪在哪儿?

sentences.en: The cloud laughed at the rainbow saying that it was an upstart gaudy in its emptiness.
sentences.cn: 云嘲笑虹霓,说它只是空虚中爆发的绚丽.

sentences.en: Until recently ICE, a fast - growing electronic upstart from Atlanta, had the edge.
sentences.cn: 位于亚特兰大的洲际交易所依靠电子交易获得了迅速发展,成为交易所业“暴发户”, 不久前还在竞购中占据上风.

sentences.en: You can't marry that young upstart!
sentences.cn: 你可不能嫁给那个年轻的暴发户!

sentences.en: You cannot marry that young upstart!
sentences.cn: 你可不能嫁给那个年轻的暴发户！

sentences.en: You impudent upstart. I shall take great delight in dispatching you myself.
sentences.cn: 你这个厚颜无耻的暴发户,如果能亲自消灭你,我会很高兴.

words.tran_cn: [经]暴发户；自命不凡的人；傲慢自负的人

trans.tran_cn: 暴发户，新贵，傲慢自负的人
trans.tran_en: someone who behaves as if they were more important than they really are and who shows a lack of respect towards people who are more experienced or older
